si.title: මහේලාගේ නැවත-මායාව
body_lines: මහේලා ජයවර්ධන මුම්බායි ඉන්දීය ක්රිකට් කණ්ඩායමේ ප්රධාන පුහුණුකරු ලෙස නැවත නම් කර තිබේ.

en.title: Mahela's re -appointment
body_lines: Mahela Jayawardena has been re -appointed as the chief coach of the Mumbai Indian Cricket Team.

summary_lines: Mahela Jayawardena re-appointed as Mumbai Indians' head coach. The former Sri Lanka captain will lead the team again, bringing his expertise to the IPL franchise.
